Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Aerotaur::
       This time he has to turn away to regain his composure.  He thinks to 
himself A disease causing rust... No... It cannot be... It was eliminated 
decades ago... unless.  Of course, the time streams.  For all we know we're 
all from different eras.  In my world the Plague was eliminated.  In hers 
it's just begun.  And in his it either hasn't happened or has already been 
forgotten.  He finally restores the calm look to his face and turns back 
around.  "Windlord, my friend, whatever you do, don't let her bite you, or 
even scratch you.  I know the disease of which she speaks.  It is a thing 
most vile.  Infection would spell death.  There is no cure.  Only a vaccine.  
Be very careful my friend.  I must go.  I have much to do."  He turns then 
and runs from the room pausing in the corridor to stop his shaking.

       He opens a comlink to Kup.  "Sir, we have a problem.  I need to speak 
with you urgently.  I'm on my way to see you."  He closes the link and 
addresses the ship's computer.  "Where is Commander Kup?"  The ship answers 
with his location and Aerotaur dashes off through the corridors.

--part1_49.2bba0894.2b956c99_boundary
